bibl.title: Christian Hymn: P. Vindob. G 40195 and P. Ryl. Copt. 33.
bibl.note: Unknown provenance, about 500 AD. May have been a writing exercise or "Federprobe". The hymn cited in the Vienna papyrus is transmitted more fully in P. Ryl. Copt. 33 recto, a bilingual paper fragment of the 10th or 11th century.
bibl.seg: Daniel Robert W., Christian Hymn: P. Vindob. G 40195 and P. Ryl. Copt. 33.

Unknown provenance, about 500 AD. May have been a writing exercise or "Federprobe". The hymn cited in the Vienna papyrus is transmitted more fully in P. Ryl. Copt. 33 recto, a bilingual paper fragment of the 10th or 11th century.
